name: The Magic Roundabout
overview: The Magic Roundabout is the direct videogame adaptation from the popular TV show for kids, recently CGI remaked. It's Friendship Day, a celebration invented by the waggish Zebedee. At this occasion, he promises Dougal a wonderful gift if he succeeds in helping all the other people in the village. So does begin Doogal's adventure. Features: * Meet all the famous characters from the show: Dougal the grumpy dog, Florence the kind hearted girl, Zebedee the strange magician, Ermintrude the cow and Dylan the sleepy rabbit. * 16 different minigames, plus unlockable bonus missions to discover within the story. * Easy to use interface : Nintendo Wii remote giving you full control of your favorite characters. shake it to find hidden objects in jars and use it to conduct an orchestra with your every move. * Original story, keeping all the atmosphere and humor of the series, plus cinematic cut scene from the TV series.
